weAreGlad: We are glad to have you here.
selectAMenuOption: Select a menu option to change your settings.
areYouSureYouWantToCancelTheOrder: Are you sure you want to cancel the order?
areYouSureYouWantToConfirmTheOrder: Are you sure you want to confirm the order?
name: Name
getReadyToLiveUniqueMoments: Get ready to live unique moments in the coolest spots in Manizales, the city is waiting for you!
parchonIsAPlatform: ParchOn is a platform dedicated to connecting the city's inhabitants and visitors with the best urban places and events. Our goal is to facilitate access to interesting activities, from concerts and exhibitions to sporting, cultural and recreational events, so that everyone can enjoy the best of the city.
weAreHereToHelpYou: Estamos aquí para ayudarte, envíanos un mensaje.
findOutWhatTheySayAbout: Find out what they say about the app and the places they have visited.
howCanIRegister: How can I register on the platform?
youCanRegister: You can register by clicking on the “Register” button in the upper right corner and completing the registration form.
yesYouCanChangeYourPassword: Yes, you can change your password from your profile in the settings section.
youCanContactSupportBy: You can contact support by sending a message to our e-mail address or through the form on the contact page.
isThereAParchonMobile: Is there a ParchOn mobile application?
noWeAreWorkingToBring: No, we are working to bring ParchOn to mobile devices.
clickOnAPhotoOrAddAnAccount: Click on a photo or add an account.
